pageTitle: Public event for November 10, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public event for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 10, 2015:

Ottawa

1:00 p.m.

The Prime Minister will be participating in We Day. The Prime Minister and Ms. Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau will be addressing youth in attendance.

Canadian Tire Centre
1000 Palladium Drive
Ottawa, Ontario
K2V 1A5

About the WE Day Movement

WE Day is a movement of young people leading local and global change. For more information, please visit www.we.org.

How to watch?

The public and media are invited to follow the event. Simply visit WE Day’s website – weday.com/watch – and watch the event live.

Notes for media:

Media covering the Prime Minister are asked to arrive at 12:30 p.m.

Media Registration:

WE Day begins at 9:15 a.m.

Media registration will open at 8:15 a.m. Please enter through the Dodge Gate entrance, located off Cyclone Taylor Blvd. There will be signage to direct you to media registration. This is where you will receive your press pass; it does not need to be picked up in advance. Please bring valid press ID or photo ID.

Restrictions to Note:

Absolutely NO WIRELESS equipment can be used and audio boards will be provided for ENGs to plug into.

Media Relations: 613-957-5555
